name: Ripper Runner
description:
Ripper Runner is a small project dedicated for the One Script Game Jam, That means every object in this game runs off a single .cs script. (for the lols).

The game which is based off the infamous serial killer Jack The Ripper, we have decided this would be a cool way to show of the Leave Something Behind theme of the jam as Jack The Ripper is known for leaving calliing cards on his victims. This is how we chose to implement the theme.

This game is a work of fiction and contains historical characters but does not wish to achive an accurate representation of them.

Thank You
